action.primary: Tonifies the Kidneys, strengthens Yang and treats impotence

indications: Impotence and debility, especially the elderly

action.primary: Resolves edema, disperses stagnant Blood, reduces swelling, dissipates nodules and resolves masses

indications: Scrofula, chronic lymphadenitis, tuberculous lymphadenitis, thyroid disease

contraindications: Contraindicated for those with Yin Deficiency with Heat.
Not recommended for those with weak digestion.
Not recommended for those with Exterior conditions.

notes: The effect of this herb is double that of Hippocampus #{HaiMa} Hai Ma. It is much bigger than Hai Ma with a longer body and a straight tail which does not curve. Hai Ma which is Warm and Sweet, fortifies the Kidneys, warms Yang, treats impotence, reduces fixed abdominal masses, treats swollen, deep-set toxic sores, difficult labor and pain from Qi and Blood Stasis.
Wine-prepared Pipe Fish Jiu Zhi Hai Long, is better tasting and is stronger at fortifying the Kidneys and tonifying Yang.
